MemoryInfobox.name: Spoiled Meats
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Diseased animals spread sickness to many who had no other food. Records survive of a Doctor|healer trying to cull the animals and obtain other food sources.'

General_Description: '''Spoiled Meats''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[Doctor|physician]] sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Physician in need of someone strong and able. I'll pay well for your help.'' She sought out the physician and addressed him. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I got your message on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Man:''' ''If you've been hunting around here, please don't eat the animals you kill.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. Why not?'' *'''Man:''' ''They're diseased. Half of the countryside is sick from eating spoiled meat.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''They should know better than to eat it.'' *'''Man:''' ''Maybe so, but people here don't have anything else. Either someone needs to take them food, or those animals need to go.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Are you asking me to slay all the animals?'' *'''Man:''' ''Yes, all of them must be gutted. Do you accept?'' (Accept - I'll kill the beasts.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.'' *'''Man:''' ''My thanks,'' misthios. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You can leave everything to me.'' Kassandra left the man to hunt the [[Wolf|wolves]]. After killing enough of them, she returned to him. *'''Man:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Man:''' ''Good work, ''misthios''. Please, take this.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.''
